meeting_info.organization: Dallas City Council Workforce, Education, and Equity Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas 75201

presenters: Dr. Lindsey Wilson, Director, Office of Equity and Inclusion
Jessica Galleshaw, Director, Office of Community Care
Nina Arias, Director, Department of Human Resources
Sonya Batts, Manager, Department of Human Resources
Heather Wood, Training Manager, Department of Human Resources
Laura Dizien, Senior Training Specialist, Department of Human Resources
Christopher Graves, Human Rights Officer, Office of Equity and Inclusion
Holly Holt, Assistant Director, Office of Community Care

agenda_items.title: Approval of the August 12, 2024 Workforce, Education, and Equity Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Reintroduction of the Workforce, Education, and Equity Committee Goals, Scope, and Action Plans and Next Steps
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the goals and action plans for the committee.

agenda_items.title: Upskilling Pilot Program September 2024 Update and Next Steps
agenda_items.description: Update on the Upskilling Pilot Program and its outcomes.

agenda_items.title: Office of Equity and Inclusion - Update on Workshop for Possible Creation of Human Rights Task Force
agenda_items.description: Update on the human rights workshop and potential task force.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Youth Commission Update on Youth Civic Awareness Week, August 2024
agenda_items.description: Report on the activities of the Youth Commission during Civic Awareness Week.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Office of Community Care Agenda Items for Early Childhood and Out of School Time Services Program Contracts
agenda_items.description: Discussion on upcoming contracts for childcare services.

agenda_items.title: Update on the Procurement for American Rescue Plan Act Redevelopment Funds Garden Box Kits
agenda_items.description: Update on the procurement process for garden box kits.

financial_items.description: Funding for childcare services through the ECOSTS Program.
Funding for Vogel Alcove to provide childcare services for homeless children.
Funding for Open Arms, Inc. to provide childcare services for special needs children.
